rules: Background must be deep charcoal/black (#050505 or #0A0A0A).
Text must be high-contrast white (#FFFFFF) for headings.
Secondary text should be neutral gray (#A1A1AA).
Gold/Orange (#F59E0B) is ONLY for specific stacking/BTC icons. Do not use for buttons or backgrounds.

styles.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tighter leading-none uppercase
styles.label: text-xs font-mono tracking-[0.2em] uppercase text-neutral-500

rules: Use generous spacing (p-12 to p-32) for section padding.
Ensure containers with borders have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
Use gap-8 to gap-12 for grids.

layout.grid_system: Use CSS Grid with 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12'. Avoid standard Bootstrap columns.
layout.alignment: Left-align text for readability. Center-align only for specific dramatic effect in Hero.

rules: No bouncy or springy animations. Keep it smooth and professional (easeOut).

Header.structure: Flexbox, justify-between, items-center, py-6 or py-8.

elements.name: Logo
elements.description: White geometric 'S' logo. Create a custom SVG component. It should look like two interlocking shapes or a sharp angular S.

elements.name: Corporate Title
elements.style: text-lg md:text-xl font-bold tracking-widest uppercase ml-4

elements.name: Contact
elements.position: Right side (or below title if mobile)

Header.rules: No navigation links. Clean and de-cluttered. Transparent background or matching body bg.

Hero.style: Minimalist. Large typography. Centered or Left-aligned.

Mission_Section.title: Mission
Mission_Section.content: Define the mission clearly. Use large text.
Mission_Section.layout: Grid layout. Title on left (col-span-4), Content on right (col-span-8).

Vision_Section.title: Vision
Vision_Section.content: Define the vision. Use large text.
Vision_Section.layout: Grid layout. Title on left (col-span-4), Content on right (col-span-8).

Projects_Section.title: Future Projects
Projects_Section.style: Minimalist placeholder. Maybe a subtle border or a mono-spaced 'LOADING...' indicator.

Footer.content: Copyright Â© Simply Smarter Ltd. All rights reserved.
Footer.rules: No social media links. No director names. No address.

icons.instructions: Use minimal icons if necessary. Prefer text over icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure Tailwind is configured for dark mode by default (or force dark colors).
2. FONTS: Use 'Inter' from Google Fonts (via import in index.css).
3. GLOBAL CSS: Set body background to #050505 and text to #FFFFFF.
4. COMPONENT: Create a 'Logo' component that renders the Geometric 'S' SVG.
5. PAGE STRUCTURE: Create a single page layout (LandingPage.js).
6. SECTIONS: Implement Header, Mission, Vision, Projects, Footer as separate components or sections within the page.
7. ANIMATION: Wrap sections in Framer Motion <motion.div> for scroll reveal.
8. CONTENT: Use placeholder text for Mission/Vision if not provided, but make it sound corporate and AI-focused (e.g., 'Leveraging artificial intelligence for superior asset security.').
9. PRIVACY: Do NOT include any fake names, addresses, or social links.
10. FINAL CHECK: Ensure high contrast (White on Black). No gradients.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use 'Inter' for headings if possible, but if limited, use Inter with tight tracking.
Ensure all text is legible against the dark background.
